featured.text: Just tell him Maria Moskovik called.
Maria didn’t want to deliver the bad news to David about his failing the job interview.
Around 1800, the seventh Duchess of Bedford, Anne Maria, began the popular practice of “afternoon tea,” a ceremony taking place at about four o’clock.

definition.zh_def: 瑪麗亞，一個常見的女性名字。
definition.en_def: Maria, a common female given name.
definition.example: Maria loves to paint in her free time.
